publicSex.startingDescription: #IF(pc.getLocationPlaceType()==PLACE_TYPE_innoxia_fields_dairyFarm_barn1) The trainees to either side of you look across as Dale pushes his [dale.cock+] into your mouth, and as they watch you starting to give him a blowjob, they each bite their lips and let out excited squeals... #ELSEIF(pc.getLocationPlaceType()==PLACE_TYPE_innoxia_fields_dairyFarm_barn2) The heifers to either side of you look across as Dale pushes his [dale.cock+] into your mouth, and as they watch you starting to give him a blowjob, they each flash you a knowing grin and let out horny whines... #ELSE The cows to either side of you look across as Dale pushes his [dale.cock+] into your mouth, and as they watch you starting to give him a blowjob, they each flash you a warm smile and let out soft moans... #ENDIF
